module.name: ql2sc
module.description: QuakeLink (gempa GmbH) to SeisComP3 event parameter exchange

parameter.name: backLog
parameter.description: Number of seconds to fetch missed updates on start up.

parameter.name: cacheSize
parameter.description: Number of public objects to cache.

parameter.name: batchSize
parameter.description: Maximum number of notifiers to batch in one message. If set to 0 no size limit is enforced. Make sure to not hit the overall message size limited of 16MiB which is enforced by the messaging system.

parameter.name: eventAssociationTimeout
parameter.description: If event synchronisation is enabled and an incoming origin is not yet associated with an event on the target machine then this timeout defines the maximum number of seconds to wait for an association.

parameter.name: hosts
parameter.description: Registration of the host profiles defining the connection parameters to the QuakeLink hosts.

group.name: host
group.description: Definition of host profiles. For each host profile a connection to one QuakeLink server can established. The profiles must be registered in 'hosts' to apply them.

struct.description: Provide the connection parameters to one QuakeLink server.

parameter.name: url
parameter.description:
URL of the QuakeLink service, the scheme 'qls' enables SSL.
Format: [ql[s]://][user:pwd@][host][:port].
If set to an empty string the application will run without any QuakeLink connection attempt.

parameter.name: native
parameter.description: Request native data instead of XML format. Native data export may be disabled on some hosts.

parameter.name: syncEventAttributes
parameter.description: Tries to update the event attributes of the target event with the attributes of the source event which includes event type and event certainty. It will not import events but tries to find the associated event of the input preferred origin at the target system and will update the event attributes via journaling.

group.name: data
group.description: Specify the XML components to fetch. Note: These options are not used if 'native' data is requested.

parameter.name: staMts
parameter.description: Include moment tensor station contributions and phase settings

parameter.name: preferred
parameter.description: Include only preferred origin and magnitude information

parameter.name: keepAlive
parameter.description: Request server to send keep alive message every 30s to prevent connection reset by firewalls on long idle periods. If activated the client will reset the connection if no alive message is received within 60s.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description:
SQL like WHERE clause to filter the result set.
clause := condition[ AND|OR [(]clause[)]] __ condition := MAG|DEPTH|LAT|LON|PHASES|OTIME|UPDATED [op float|time]|[IS [NOT] NULL] __ op := =|>|>=|<|<=|eq|gt|ge|lt|ge __ time := %Y,%m,%d[,%H,%M,%S,%f]

parameter.name: routingTable
parameter.description: Maps datamodel class names to messaging groups. For unmapped objects the mapping of their parent objects is evaluated recursively. Objects may be excluded by mapping them to 'NULL'.
